# Golf the High Sierra (GTHS)
# The premier golf trip planner for Reno, Lake Tahoe, Carson Valley & Graeagle since 2004.
# Website: https://golfthehighsierra.com
# Phone: 1-888-584-8232
# Email: info@golfthehighsierra.com
# Service: Custom group golf packages for 4-400+ players across 5 regions in Northern Nevada and California

## About
Golf the High Sierra plans turnkey golf trips in the Reno-Tahoe-Carson Valley-Graeagle region. Services include tee time coordination, hotel booking, dining reservations, transportation, and event planning for buddy trips, corporate outings, and charity tournaments. Over 20 years of experience with 20,000+ groups served.

## Golf Courses (26)
- ArrowCreek Country Club | Reno, NV | Par 72 | 7150 yards | Slope 142 | Designer: Arnold Palmer (Legend) / Fuzzy Zoeller (Challenge) | Rating: 4.8/5 | Price: $219–$429 | URL: https://golfthehighsierra.com/portfolio/arrowcreek-golf-club/

- Reno, NV (10 courses, 8 hotels, 40+ venues)

- Carson Valley, NV (2 courses, 1 hotel)
- Graeagle / Plumas County, CA (3 courses, 2 lodges)
